title: Rain denies Shubman Gill his maiden 100
description: India finish with 225/3 in 36 overs; West Indies chasing DLS revised target of 257 in 35 overs

title: ICC strongly defends ODI format
description: In the backdrop of South Africa withdrawing from their ODI tour of Australia and Ben Stokes quitting the format, many have questioned the relevance of 50-over cricket

title: Nottinghamshire in pole position after Haseeb Hameed 94
description: Elsewhere, Kyle Abbott and Mohammad Abbas share seven as Yorkshire are bowled out for 272

title: Finn Allen's maiden ton sinks Scotland in series opener
description: Allen smashed 101 off 56 to power New Zealand to 225, a total that Scotland fell well short of

title: Asia Cup 2022 officially moved to UAE
description: Sri Lanka Cricket will retain hosting rights of the tournament, which will be played between August 27 and September 11

title: Dhananjaya ton headlines another day of SL dominance
description: Pakistan need 419 runs on the final day with nine wickets in hand

title: Sri Lanka dismiss Shafique after setting massive target
description: A century from Dhananjaya de Silva left the visitors needing 508 in the fourth innings for victory

title: Dhananjaya nears ton as Sri Lanka stretch lead past 400
description: Riding on the back of half-centuries by Dhananjaya de Silva and Dimuth Karunaratne, Sri Lanka extended their lead to 444 at Lunch on Day 4

title: We are sticking through these tough times: Nicholas Pooran
description: After losing yet another ODI series to India, the West Indies skipper said that the players are 'hurting' but at the same time confident of steering the side back to winning ways

title: County Wrap: Ollie Pope fifty gives Surrey lead
description: Elsewhere, Derbyshire staged a great comeback in the final session to turn the tables against Worcestershire
